channel.title: Client run help
channel.description:
@echo off title InternationPK cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
and it says
Error: could not find or load main class : Gui
if it is my classpath or path what should it be?

item.title: Client run help
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

it’s probably not your run.bat, but change the “gui” to “egui” just on the off chance you’ve got egui.java instead. it could be that you got a bad download, or it wasn’t fully working before you got it. does it have a gui.java file?

Read full topic

item.title: Client run help
item.dc:creator: @PimpDaddyXD PimpDaddyXD
item.description:
@PimpDaddyXD wrote:

@echo off
title InternationPK
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32

and it says

Error: could not find or load main class : Gui

if it is my classpath or path what should it be?

Read full topic
